steps.title: Enter Item Name
steps.description: Type 'Espresso beans' into the item input field to specify the product to add.

hints.notes: Input field for item name with high confidence selector

dom_selectors:
getByText('Item name
Quantity
Add to List')
steps.title: Submit Random Grocery Item
steps.description: Submit the form with a randomly selected grocery item and default quantity of '1' to add it to the shopping list.

hints.notes: Form submission with randomly generated grocery item. LLM will select an appropriate grocery item each execution.

history.instructions: Change the submit shopping item form to enter some random grocery item
history.notes: Changed step 2 execution mode from 'deterministic' to 'llm' to enable random grocery item generation at runtime. The LLM will select a different grocery item for each execution.
